TopicTitle: SInce new 1.3.X update, everything is painfully bright

Articles.Content: This is a problem I have in all three of my 1.3 games; one is modded with 52 mods and the other is my "galactic playground" for building a new solar system mod. But now, I've got a lot of light. Any suggestions?
Go into your settings and make sure the ambient lighting isn't turned up really high.
